name.japanese: LEVEL5.5 ニューカマーランド
name.romanized: Reberu Go Ten Go - Nyūkamā Rando

description: A secret level hidden between Level 5 and Level 6 of Impel Down, created long ago by a prisoner with a digging Devil Fruit. It serves as a paradise for Emporio Ivankov and the Newkama community.

keyEvents.title: Death Wink Demonstrated
keyEvents.description: Ivankov demonstrates his Death Wink technique against a vengeful pirate.

keyEvents.title: Gender Transformation Ability Revealed
keyEvents.description: Ivankov demonstrates his gender transformation powers on a pirate.

keyEvents.title: Bon Clay's Plea for Luffy
keyEvents.description: Bon Clay desperately pleads with Ivankov to save Luffy's life.

keyEvents.title: Healing Hormones Debut
keyEvents.description: Ivankov begins treating Luffy with his Healing Hormones technique.

significance: A hidden sanctuary within the world's most secure prison, representing freedom and acceptance within confinement.
climate: Temperate (contrasts with the extreme cold of Level 5)

description: The fifth level of Impel Down, a frozen wasteland where prisoners are kept in extreme cold and hunted by wolves.

keyEvents.title: Buggy and Galdino's Wolf Encounter
keyEvents.description: Buggy and Galdino encounter fierce wolves while fleeing on wax stilts.

significance: One of the harshest levels of Impel Down, where extreme cold serves as both punishment and deterrent.
